author: sanderpe

comments.content: As you said, it looks like [Neutraface No.2](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132725/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface2/viewfonts), Display Bold on the first sample and Display Titling on the second.
Thank you. I thought that was it, but I didn’t recognize the bowl on the R and the higher crossbar on the F.
